summary: This document appears to be a training completion record for a Bureau of Prisons (BOP) employee, listing various required annual and refresher courses completed between 2015 and 2019. It includes certifications in areas such as firearms, correctional care, security, and PREA (Prison Rape Elimination Act).
keyFacts: The document is a training record for a BOP employee, showing compliance with numerous annual requirements.
Training topics include firearms certification, trauma-informed correctional care, PREA, information security, and weapons of mass destruction.
The record spans from 2015 to 2019, with the most recent completions in March 2019.
No specific individuals are named in the provided text; it is a generic administrative record.
